subject: Meeting Tomorrow
body:
Hey John,

Just a reminder about our meeting tomorrow at 10:00 AM. Please be on time.

Best regards,
Jane

subject: Summer Vacation Plans
body:
Hi Jane,

I hope you're doing well. I wanted to discuss our plans for the summer vacation. Let's catch up soon!

Cheers,
Mike

subject: Project Status Update
body:
Hello Team,

I wanted to update everyone on the status of our current project. We're making good progress!

Best regards,
Mike
